common.i18n

Interface I18nResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeI18nResolver, YamlI18nResolver
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface I18nResolver
    Resolves i18n messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> get(java.util.List<java.util.Locale> locales, java.lang.String bundle, java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object... args)
      Resolves i18n message identified by a bundle and a key for the the first found given locale.
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> get(java.util.Locale locale, java.lang.String bundle, java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object... args)
      Resolves i18n message identified by a bundle and a key for the given locale.
      default java.lang.String getOrEmpty(java.util.List<java.util.Locale> locales, java.lang.String bundle, java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object... args)
      Resolves i18n message identified by a bundle and a key for the the first found given locale.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> get(java.util.Locale locale,
                                         java.lang.String bundle,
                                         java.lang.String key,
                                         java.lang.Object... args)
        Resolves i18n message identified by a bundle and a key for the given locale.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale used to translate the message
        bundle - name of the bundle containing the message key
        key - identifier of the message
        args - optional list of arguments
        Returns:
        the resolved message in the given language, or absent if it could not be found

      • get

        default java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> get(java.util.List<java.util.Locale> locales,
                                                 java.lang.String bundle,
                                                 java.lang.String key,
                                                 java.lang.Object... args)
        Resolves i18n message identified by a bundle and a key for the the first found given locale.
        Parameters:
        locales - the list of locales used to translate the message
        bundle - name of the bundle containing the message key
        key - identifier of the message
        args - optional list of arguments
        Returns:
        the resolved message in the any of the given languages, or absent if it could not be found

      • getOrEmpty

        default java.lang.String getOrEmpty(java.util.Locale locale,
                                    java.lang.String bundle,
                                    java.lang.String key,
                                    java.lang.Object... args)
        Resolves i18n message identified by a bundle and a key for the the first found given locale.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale used to translate the message
        bundle - name of the bundle containing the message key
        key - identifier of the message
        args - optional list of arguments
        Returns:
        the resolved message in the first found given language, or empty string if it could not be found

      • getOrEmpty

        default java.lang.String getOrEmpty(java.util.List<java.util.Locale> locales,

        key - identifier of the message
